recipes.name: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.author: John Doe
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, chop pancetta and cook in a skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta and add to skillet with pancetta.
Pour egg mixture over pasta and stir until sauce thickens.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.author: Jane Doe
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes, or until edges are golden brown.
Let cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
